ccbb2fc7de4b0fc7d6ec4e53756e178b.description: Cannot start n8n service due to port 5678 already in use

actions_taken: Ran 'docker ps' to check running containers
Ran 'lsof -i :5678' to identify process using port
Found existing n8n container still running
troubleshooting_attempts.actual_outcome: Found old n8n container from previous session

ccbb2fc7de4b0fc7d6ec4e53756e178b.resolution: Stopped conflicting n8n container and restarted services
prevention_recommendations: Always run 'docker compose down -v' before switching environments
Implement cleanup scripts for existing containers

ddf13699ab9214d3483775703e990c39.description: Ollama fails to download qwen2.5 model
symptoms: qwen2.5:7b model not available after service start

troubleshooting_attempts.description: Check network connectivity and disk space
actions_taken: Ran 'df -h' to check disk space (had only 2GB free)
Checked Ollama logs for specific error messages
troubleshooting_attempts.expected_outcome: Identify disk space or network issues
troubleshooting_attempts.actual_outcome: Found disk space issue - only 1GB free, needed ~4GB

ddf13699ab9214d3483775703e990c39.resolution: Cleaned up disk space and restarted Ollama service
prevention_recommendations: Set up automatic cleanup of old Docker images
Use external model storage if running low on space
